name: Super Bloostar Adventures: Bloostar Vs. The Rainbow Death Squares of DOOM
name_original: Super Bloostar Adventures: Bloostar Vs. The Rainbow Death Squares of DOOM
description:
Help Bloostar fend off the nefarious Death Squares! Of DOOM! Play while paying half-attention to the latest episode of your favourite TV show! Or plop your kid in front of the computer to keep 'em busy while the grownups are talking! Got a laptop? Play it on the toilet! Play it IN the toilet, we don't mind! The possibilities are endless!

★★★ Super Bloostar Adventures ★★★

★★★ Bloostar Vs. The Rainbow Death Squares of DOOM ★★★

Exciting Features of DOOM!

- One-button, one-handed addictive gameplay!
- 8-bit graphics lovingly fused with some nice particle effects!
- Space!
- Shooting!
- Fun!
- Things!
- Exclamation points!!!!!!!!
